thread.section_title: Solid Apollo LED Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Solid Apollo LED | solidapollo.com | 2 of 20
thread.title: Chris
thread.title_full: Solid Apollo LED reviewed by Chris

author: Chris
title: Chris
text:
I contacted Solid Apollo and explained to Andrew what I had and what I wanted to do .... that was the most difficult part of the project, Andrew made short work of my questions and concerns, explained my options and sent me a list of what I would need and the price for same.
Andrew explained in detail how to complete my project and the order was placed, everything I needed was delivered in less time than I was told and thanks to the information I was given, I completed the project in less time than it took to explain what I wanted to accomplish in the first place.
The system works better than I imagined and I am extremely pleased with the experience from the initial phone call to flipping the light switch at the completion of the project.
